001// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0-or-later
002
003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.persistence;
004
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.function.Consumer;
008
009import javax.persistence.EntityGraph;
010import javax.persistence.EntityManager;
011import javax.persistence.EntityManagerFactory;
012import javax.persistence.EntityTransaction;
013import javax.persistence.FlushModeType;
014import javax.persistence.LockModeType;
015import javax.persistence.Query;
016import javax.persistence.StoredProcedureQuery;
017import javax.persistence.TypedQuery;
018import javax.persistence.criteria.CriteriaBuilder;
019import javax.persistence.criteria.CriteriaDelete;
020import javax.persistence.criteria.CriteriaQuery;
021import javax.persistence.criteria.CriteriaUpdate;
022import javax.persistence.metamodel.Metamodel;
023
024import lombok.AllArgsConstructor;
025import lombok.NonNull;
026
027/**
028 * Big class of doom that decorates a {@link EntityManager}, executing an action
029 * whenever a transaction is retrieved by {@link #getTransaction()}.
030 *
031 * @author Alejandro González García
032 */
033@AllArgsConstructor
034final class EntityManagerTransactionDecorator implements EntityManager {
035        @NonNull
036        private final EntityManager baseEntityManager;
037        @NonNull
038        private final Consumer<? super EntityTransaction> gotTransactionAction;
039
040        @Override
041        public void persist(Object entity) {
042                baseEntityManager.persist(entity);
043        }
044
045        @Override
046        public <T> T merge(T entity) {
047                return baseEntityManager.merge(entity);
048        }
049
050        @Override
051        public void remove(Object entity) {
052                baseEntityManager.remove(entity);
053        }
054
055        @Override
056        public <T> T find(Class<T> entityClass, Object primaryKey) {
057                return baseEntityManager.find(entityClass, primaryKey);
058        }
059
060        @Override
061        public <T> T find(Class<T> entityClass, Object primaryKey, Map<String, Object> properties) {
062                return baseEntityManager.find(entityClass, primaryKey, properties);
063        }
064
065        @Override
066        public <T> T find(Class<T> entityClass, Object primaryKey, LockModeType lockMode) {
067                return baseEntityManager.find(entityClass, primaryKey, lockMode);
068        }
069
070        @Override
071        public <T> T find(Class<T> entityClass, Object primaryKey, LockModeType lockMode, Map<String, Object> properties) {
072                return baseEntityManager.find(entityClass, primaryKey, lockMode, properties);
073        }
074
075        @Override
076        public <T> T getReference(Class<T> entityClass, Object primaryKey) {
077                return baseEntityManager.getReference(entityClass, primaryKey);
078        }
079
080        @Override
081        public void flush() {
082                baseEntityManager.flush();
083        }
084
085        @Override
086        public void setFlushMode(FlushModeType flushMode) {
087                baseEntityManager.setFlushMode(flushMode);
088        }
089
090        @Override
091        public FlushModeType getFlushMode() {
092                return baseEntityManager.getFlushMode();
093        }
094
095        @Override
096        public void lock(Object entity, LockModeType lockMode) {
097                baseEntityManager.lock(entity, lockMode);
098        }
099
100        @Override
101        public void lock(Object entity, LockModeType lockMode, Map<String, Object> properties) {
102                baseEntityManager.lock(entity, lockMode, properties);
103        }
104
105        @Override
106        public void refresh(Object entity) {
107                baseEntityManager.refresh(entity);
108        }
109
110        @Override
111        public void refresh(Object entity, Map<String, Object> properties) {
112                baseEntityManager.refresh(entity, properties);
113        }
114
115        @Override
116        public void refresh(Object entity, LockModeType lockMode) {
117                baseEntityManager.refresh(entity, lockMode);
118        }
119
120        @Override
121        public void refresh(Object entity, LockModeType lockMode, Map<String, Object> properties) {
122                baseEntityManager.refresh(entity, lockMode, properties);
123        }
124
125        @Override
126        public void clear() {
127                baseEntityManager.clear();
128        }
129
130        @Override
131        public void detach(Object entity) {
132                baseEntityManager.detach(entity);
133        }
134
135        @Override
136        public boolean contains(Object entity) {
137                return baseEntityManager.contains(entity);
138        }
139
140        @Override
141        public LockModeType getLockMode(Object entity) {
142                return baseEntityManager.getLockMode(entity);
143        }
144
145        @Override
146        public void setProperty(String propertyName, Object value) {
147                baseEntityManager.setProperty(propertyName, value);
148        }
149
150        @Override
151        public Map<String, Object> getProperties() {
152                return baseEntityManager.getProperties();
153        }
154
155        @Override
156        public Query createQuery(String qlString) {
157                return baseEntityManager.createQuery(qlString);
158        }
159
160        @Override
161        public <T> TypedQuery<T> createQuery(CriteriaQuery<T> criteriaQuery) {
162                return baseEntityManager.createQuery(criteriaQuery);
163        }
164
165        @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
166        @Override
167        public Query createQuery(CriteriaUpdate updateQuery) {
168                return baseEntityManager.createQuery(updateQuery);
169        }
170
171        @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
172        @Override
173        public Query createQuery(CriteriaDelete deleteQuery) {
174                return baseEntityManager.createQuery(deleteQuery);
175        }
176
177        @Override
178        public <T> TypedQuery<T> createQuery(String qlString, Class<T> resultClass) {
179                return baseEntityManager.createQuery(qlString, resultClass);
180        }
181
182        @Override
183        public Query createNamedQuery(String name) {
184                return baseEntityManager.createNamedQuery(name);
185        }
186
187        @Override
188        public <T> TypedQuery<T> createNamedQuery(String name, Class<T> resultClass) {
189                return baseEntityManager.createNamedQuery(name, resultClass);
190        }
191
192        @Override
193        public Query createNativeQuery(String sqlString) {
194                return baseEntityManager.createNativeQuery(sqlString);
195        }
196
197        @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
198        @Override
199        public Query createNativeQuery(String sqlString, Class resultClass) {
200                return baseEntityManager.createNativeQuery(sqlString, resultClass);
201        }
202
203        @Override
204        public Query createNativeQuery(String sqlString, String resultSetMapping) {
205                return baseEntityManager.createNativeQuery(sqlString, resultSetMapping);
206        }
207
208        @Override
209        public StoredProcedureQuery createNamedStoredProcedureQuery(String name) {
210                return baseEntityManager.createNamedStoredProcedureQuery(name);
211        }
212
213        @Override
214        public StoredProcedureQuery createStoredProcedureQuery(String procedureName) {
215                return baseEntityManager.createStoredProcedureQuery(procedureName);
216        }
217
218        @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
219        @Override
220        public StoredProcedureQuery createStoredProcedureQuery(String procedureName, Class... resultClasses) {
221                return baseEntityManager.createStoredProcedureQuery(procedureName, resultClasses);
222        }
223
224        @Override
225        public StoredProcedureQuery createStoredProcedureQuery(String procedureName, String... resultSetMappings) {
226                return baseEntityManager.createStoredProcedureQuery(procedureName, resultSetMappings);
227        }
228
229        @Override
230        public void joinTransaction() {
231                baseEntityManager.joinTransaction();
232        }
233
234        @Override
235        public boolean isJoinedToTransaction() {
236                return baseEntityManager.isJoinedToTransaction();
237        }
238
239        @Override
240        public <T> T unwrap(Class<T> cls) {
241                return baseEntityManager.unwrap(cls);
242        }
243
244        @Override
245        public Object getDelegate() {
246                return baseEntityManager.getDelegate();
247        }
248
249        @Override
250        public void close() {
251                baseEntityManager.close();
252        }
253
254        @Override
255        public boolean isOpen() {
256                return baseEntityManager.isOpen();
257        }
258
259        @Override
260        public EntityTransaction getTransaction() {
261                final EntityTransaction entityTransaction = baseEntityManager.getTransaction();
262
263                gotTransactionAction.accept(entityTransaction);
264
265                return entityTransaction;
266        }
267
268        @Override
269        public EntityManagerFactory getEntityManagerFactory() {
270                return baseEntityManager.getEntityManagerFactory();
271        }
272
273        @Override
274        public CriteriaBuilder getCriteriaBuilder() {
275                return baseEntityManager.getCriteriaBuilder();
276        }
277
278        @Override
279        public Metamodel getMetamodel() {
280                return baseEntityManager.getMetamodel();
281        }
282
283        @Override
284        public <T> EntityGraph<T> createEntityGraph(Class<T> rootType) {
285                return baseEntityManager.createEntityGraph(rootType);
286        }
287
288        @Override
289        public EntityGraph<?> createEntityGraph(String graphName) {
290                return baseEntityManager.createEntityGraph(graphName);
291        }
292
293        @Override
294        public EntityGraph<?> getEntityGraph(String graphName) {
295                return baseEntityManager.getEntityGraph(graphName);
296        }
297
298        @Override
299        public <T> List<EntityGraph<? super T>> getEntityGraphs(Class<T> entityClass) {
300                return baseEntityManager.getEntityGraphs(entityClass);
301        }
302}
